Changelog
=========

1.2 (2012-22-27)
-------------------

- Option for download link [espenmn]

1.1.1 (2012-08-29)
-------------------

- Option for using thumbnail size [espenmn]


1.1 (2012-08-29)
-------------------

- Added option to set number of effects [espenmn]


1.0.1 (2012-08-28)
-------------------

- Added translations (en + no) [espenmn]
- Added effect on images when page is loaded [espenmn]


1.0 (2012-08-21)
-------------------

- Initial release [espenmn]
